description.short: TotalAgility Agent - an Intelligent Automation Agent running on TotalAgility.
description.full: TotalAgility Agent provides a Teams interface to engage an Intelligent Automation Agent running on TotalAgility.

commands.title: Help & Guidance
commands.description: What tasks are you able to do for me?

commands.title: What is in my workqueue today?
commands.description: Searches the TotalAgility work queue & active jobs using the provided prompt.

commands.title: Work Item Details
commands.description: Give me the details of job: 58710728C9EF11EFA8502818785AA6F9

commands.title: Shipments clearing customs today
commands.description: What shipments do we have clearing customs today?

commands.title: Shipments details
commands.description: Can you get me all the details of that shipment?

commands.title: Hazardous material handling
commands.description: What are the operating procedures for handling that kind of material?

commands.title: Shipment Cross-Checking
commands.description: Are all the documents in order for this shipment?

commands.title: Goods Acceptance
commands.description: Initiate the eSigning process to complete acceptance and release of the goods.
